name: Dodger! (gamepy)
description:
Welcome to Dodger! A small game that I have made using pygame and python.

It is a relatively simple game, where you dodge cars, hence the name; Dodger! 

> So what is it about?

> Well, you dodge cars. That's it.

> That's it?

>Yeah, that's about it. Also, this is my first game!

CREDITS!

Music in-game: 

NOTE: Game is still in development!
